itemData.name: Socket Bracer
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Socket Bracer
Permanently add a socket to your bracers. Requires a level 60 or higher item.

Cannot add more than one socket to an item. Can only add a socket to your own armor, and adding a socket binds the item to you. The added socket requires that you maintain 400 blacksmithing or it will become inactive.

itemData.name: Socket Gloves
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Socket Gloves
Permanently add a socket to your gloves. Requires a level 60 or higher item.

Cannot add more than one socket to an item. Can only add a socket to your own armor, and adding a socket binds the item to you. The added socket requires that you maintain 400 blacksmithing or it will become inactive.

itemData.name: Eternal Belt Buckle
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Eternal Belt Buckle
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently attach an eternal belt buckle onto a belt, adding a socket to the belt.

Attaching the belt buckle causes the item to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 4

itemData.name: Titanium Plating
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Titanium Plating
Requires Level 70
Use: Permanently attach lightweight titanium plating to a shield, increasing block value by 81 and reducing the duration of Disarm effects by 50%. Does not stack with other similar effects.

Attaching Titanium Plating to your shield causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 3

itemData.name: Titanium Shield Spike
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Titanium Shield Spike
Requires Level 70
Use: Attaches a Titanium Spike to your shield that deals 45 to 67 damage every time you block with it.

Attaching a Titanium Shield Spike to your shield causes it to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 1 20

itemData.name: Titanium Weapon Chain
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Titanium Weapon Chain
Requires Level 70
Use: Attaches a chain to your weapon, reducing the duration of Disarm effects by 50% and increasing your hit rating by 28. Does not stack with other similar effects.

Attaching the weapon chain causes the weapon to become soulbound.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 1 80

itemData.name: Titanium Skeleton Key
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Titanium Skeleton Key
Requires Blacksmithing (430)
Use: Allows opening of locks that require up to 400 lockpicking skill. The skeleton key is consumed in the process.
1 Charge
Sell Price: 6 25

itemData.name: Cobalt Skeleton Key
itemData.htmlTooltip:
Cobalt Skeleton Key
Requires Blacksmithing (350)
Use: Allows opening of locks that require up to 375 lockpicking skill. The skeleton key is consumed in the process.
